alert.note: Alert for Leon; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 17 at 2:28PM CDT until May 18 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Navasota River Near Easterly affecting Robertson and Leon Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navasota River Near Easterly. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding will occur from below Easterly to below Highway 21. Cattle in the flood plain could be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 10.8 feet Monday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
